packageMeta.name: purescript-crypt-nacl
packageMeta.description: A wrapper of tweetnacl-js for Purescript

declarations.comments: Get a `BoxSecretKey` from the given `BoxKeyPair`
declarations.title: getBoxSecretKey

declarations.comments: Get a `BoxPublicKey` from the given `BoxKeyPair`
declarations.title: getBoxPublicKey

declarations.comments: Get a `BoxKeyPair` from the given `BoxSecretKey`
declarations.title: getBoxKeyPair

declarations.comments: Generate a `BoxKeyPair` for NaCl Box operations
declarations.title: generateBoxKeyPair

declarations.comments:
Similar to `boxOpen`, but opens a box with a `BoxSharedKey` that has been
generated with `boxBefore` instead of a `BoxPublicKey` and `BoxSecretKey`
declarations.title: boxOpenAfter

declarations.comments:
Opening a box decrypts and authenticates the message.
This will return the `Message` plaintext if decryption and SignatureB64
validation succeeds, and `Nothing` if authentication or decryption fails.
declarations.title: boxOpen

declarations.comments:
Create a `BoxSharedKey` from one user's `BoxPublicKey` and a separate
user's `BoxSecretKey`
declarations.title: boxBefore

declarations.comments: Create a `Box` with a `BoxSharedKey`
declarations.title: boxAfter

declarations.comments: Create a `Box`, which is an encrypted, authenticated message
declarations.title: box

declarations.comments:
Denotes a class of NaCl types which are convertable to `Uint8Array`s.
Instances of this typeclass will `unsafeCoerce` their values to `Uint8Array`
because we know that everything in/out of the underlying library are,
in fact, `Uint8Array`s.
declarations.title: Uint8ArrayAble

declarations.comments:
This type class denotes types that can be decoded to a UTF8 String.

The `toString` function returns `Either Error String` to handle errors
during the decode.  We will generally `unsafeCoerce` because we know the
underlying type is already of Uint8Array from the wrapped library.
declarations.title: Utf8Decodable

declarations.comments:
This type class denotes types that can be encoded to a UTF8 String.
The `fromString` function returns the type of the type class instance.
We will generally `unsafeCoerce` from the `Uint8Array` type to the
NaCl type we want because all underlying types are `Uint8Array`
declarations.title: Utf8Encodable

declarations.comments: Compute the SHA-512 hash of any `Uint8Array`
declarations.title: hash

declarations.comments: Generate a cryptographically secure, random Nonce for NaCl operations
declarations.title: generateNonce

declarations.comments:
Open a SecretBox, returning `Maybe Message`
If decryption and authentication succeed, `Just Message` will be
returned.  If decryption or authentication fail, `Nothing` will be returned
declarations.title: secretBoxOpen

declarations.comments: Create a SecretBox, which is an encrypted and authenticated message
declarations.title: secretBox

declarations.comments: Generate a key for use with a `SecretBox`
declarations.title: generateSecretBoxKey

declarations.comments: Verifies a `Signature`, given the `Message`
declarations.title: verifyDetached

declarations.comments:
Varifies the signature contained in a `SignedMessage` against a given
`SignPublicKey`.  Returns `Just Message` if the signature verifies,
or `Nothing` otherwise.
declarations.title: signOpen

declarations.comments: Like `sign`, but only returns the `Signature`, not the message contents
declarations.title: signDetached

declarations.comments:
Sign a `Message` using the given `SignSecretKey`.
Returns the contents of the message, signed, as a `SignedMessage`
declarations.title: sign

declarations.comments: Get the `SignSecretKey` for a given `SignKeyPair`
declarations.title: getSignSecretKey

declarations.comments: Get the `SignPublicKey` for a given `SignKeyPair`
declarations.title: getSignPublicKey

declarations.comments: Get the signing keypair for a given `SignSecretKey`
declarations.title: getSignKeyPair

declarations.comments: Generate a random key pair for signing messages
declarations.title: generateSignKeyPair

declarations.comments: A NaCl SignedMessage, which is represented as a Uint8Array in JS
declarations.title: SignedMessage

declarations.comments: A NaCl Signature
declarations.title: Signature

declarations.comments: A NaCl SignSecretKey
declarations.title: SignSecretKey

declarations.comments: A NaCl SignPublicKey
declarations.title: SignPublicKey

declarations.comments: A NaCl `SignKeyPair` containing a `SignPublicKey` and a `SignSecretKey`
declarations.title: SignKeyPair

declarations.title: SecretBoxKey

declarations.comments: a NaCL SecretBox
declarations.title: SecretBox

declarations.comments: A NaCl Nonce
declarations.title: Nonce

declarations.comments: A NaCl Message, which is represented as a Uint8Array in JS
declarations.title: Message

declarations.comments: A NaCl SHA-512 Hash
declarations.title: HashSha512

declarations.comments: A NaCl BoxSharedKey
declarations.title: BoxSharedKey

declarations.title: BoxSecretKey

declarations.comments: A NaCl BoxPublicKey
declarations.title: BoxPublicKey

declarations.comments: A NaCl `BoxKeyPair` containing a `BoxPublicKey` and a `BoxSecretKey`
declarations.title: BoxKeyPair

declarations.comments: A NaCl Box, which is an encrypted, authenticated message
declarations.title: Box

declarations.comments: Generate a `BoxKeyPair` for NaCl Box operations
declarations.title: generateBoxKeyPair

declarations.title: getBoxKeyPair

declarations.title: getBoxPublicKey

Create a `BoxSharedKey` from one user's `BoxPublicKey` and a separate
user's `BoxSecretKey`

declarations.comments:
Opening a box decrypts and authenticates the message.
This will return the `Message` plaintext if decryption and SignatureB64
validation succeeds, and `Nothing` if authentication or decryption fails.
declarations.title: boxOpen

declarations.comments:
Similar to `boxOpen`, but opens a box with a `BoxSharedKey` that has been
generated with `boxBefore` instead of a `BoxPublicKey` and `BoxSecretKey`
declarations.title: boxOpenAfter
